name: Raptors Rising
text:
During this Duel, you can only use "Raidraptor" monsters as materials for Xyz Summoning. Also when you Xyz Summon "Raidraptor - Rise Falcon", you can Summon it using a "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster on your field except for "Raidraptor - Rise Falcon".
In addition, the following effect can be used once per turn and twice per Duel. Remove 1 Xyz Material from 1 "Raidraptor - Rise Falcon" you control, and Set 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell Card to your field from your Deck. Then, you can increase the Rank of that monster by 1 or 2. At the end of the turn you have used this Skill, return all Rank 4 Xyz Monsters on your field and/or Graveyard to the Extra Deck.
